verses.verse: <S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake;<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%> for from now <S%H6258>on<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into you the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean.<s%>

<S%H5287>Shake<s%> yourself from the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> down, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H6605>loose<s%> yourself from the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> O <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> You have <S%H4376>sold<s%> yourselves for <S%H2600>nothing;<s%> and you shall be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7223>aforetime<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> them <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H657>cause.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6311>here,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> away for <S%H2600>nothing?<s%> they that <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them make them to <S%H3213>howl,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H5006>blasphemed.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8034>name:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> they shall know in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I am he that does <S%H1696>speak:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is I.

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H4998>beautiful<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that <S%H1319>brings<s%> <S%H1319>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings,<s%> that <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> that <S%H1319>brings<s%> <S%H1319>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of <S%H2896>good,<s%> that <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H3444>salvation;<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> Your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigns!<s%>

Your <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up the <S%H6963>voice;<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall they <S%H7442>sing:<s%> for they shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

<S%H6476>Break<s%> forth into joy, <S%H7442>sing<s%> together, you <S%H2723>waste<s%> places of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> he has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has made <S%H2834>bare<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H5493>Depart<s%> you, <S%H5493>depart<s%> you, <S%H3318>go<s%> you out from <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing; <S%H3318>go<s%> you out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her; be you <S%H1305>clean,<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out with <S%H2649>haste,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H4499>flight:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be your rear <S%H622>guard.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall deal <S%H7919>prudently,<s%> he shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> and <S%H5375>extolled,<s%> and be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1361>high.<s%>

As <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at you; his <S%H4758>visage<s%> was so <S%H4893>marred<s%> more than any <S%H376>man,<s%> and his <S%H8389>form<s%> more than the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men:<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> at him: for that <S%H834>which<s%> had not been <S%H5608>told<s%> them shall they <S%H7200>see;<s%> and that <S%H834>which<s%> they had not <S%H8085>heard<s%> shall they <S%H995>consider.<s%>
